mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT gn.id, g.group_id, g.group_name, g.avatar AS group_avatar, u.id AS target_id, u.username AS target_username, u.nickname AS target_nickname, u1.id AS operator_id, u1.username AS operator_username, u1.nickname AS operator_nickname, gn.`type`, gn.create_time FROM easychat.ec_group_notification gn LEFT JOIN ec_group g ON gn.group_id = g.group_id LEFT JOIN ec_user u ON u.id = gn.target_id LEFT JOIN ec_user u1 ON u1.id = gn.operator_id LEFT JOIN ec_group_member gm ON gm.group_id = gn.group_id WHERE (gn.target_id = #{userId} OR gn.operator_id = #{userId} OR gn.type = 13) OR (gn.type >= 4 AND gm.role > 0 AND gm.user_id = #{userId}) AND g.deleted = 0 AND u.deleted = 0 AND (u1.deleted = 0 OR u1.deleted IS NULL) AND gm.deleted = 0 ORDER BY gn.create_time DESC
